name.en: Design and Applications of Intelligent Control Systems
name.ch: 智慧型控制系統設計與應用

department.ch: 永續綠能科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master Programs, Sustainability in Green Energy

goal.ch: “Assure students have the fundamental knowledge of fuzzy logic, neural networks, genetic algorithms and intelligent control applications.“
goal.en: “Assure students have the fundamental knowledge of fuzzy logic, neural networks, genetic algorithms and intelligent control applications.“

outline.ch:
◎Fuzzy Logic Control
Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
1. Fuzzy logic and approximate reasoning
2. Fuzzy logic control system
◎Artificial Neural Networks
3. Feedforward neural networks and supervised learning
4. Recurrent neural networks and supervised learning
5. Self-organized neural networks
◎Advanced Intelligent Control
6 Genetic algorithms
7 Integrating fuzzy systems and neural networks
8 Lyapunov stability and intelligent control systems
9 Applications of fuzzy and neural networks in control
◎Paper Study
10. Final Presentation
outline.en:
◎Fuzzy Logic Control
Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
1. Fuzzy logic and approximate reasoning
2. Fuzzy logic control system
◎Artificial Neural Networks
3. Feedforward neural networks and supervised learning
4. Recurrent neural networks and supervised learning
5. Self-organized neural networks
◎Advanced Intelligent Control
6 Genetic algorithms
7 Integrating fuzzy systems and neural networks
8 Lyapunov stability and intelligent control systems
9 Applications of fuzzy and neural networks in control
◎Paper Study
10. Final Presentation

textbook.ch:
“教科書：
1. C. T. Lin and C. S. G. Lee, Neural Fuzzy Systems. Prentice-Hall, 1996
2. M. Negnevitsky, Artificial Intelligence. Addison Wesley, 2002

參考書：
Related papers in intelligent control techniques for motor drives, 2001-2007“
textbook.en:
“Textbook：
1. C. T. Lin and C. S. G. Lee, Neural Fuzzy Systems. Prentice-Hall, 1996
2. M. Negnevitsky, Artificial Intelligence. Addison Wesley, 2002

Reference：
Related papers in intelligent control techniques for motor drives, 2001-2007“

gradMethod.ch:
成績計算：
1. Midterm examination: 35％
2. Computer simulation home works: 20％
3. Final report and presentation: 40％
4. Learning attitude: 5％
gradMethod.en:
Midterm examination 35％
Computer simulation home works 20％
Final report and presentation 40％
Learning attitude 5％

ch.competencies: 分析及處理問題的能力

ch: 系所:限永續綠能科技碩士學位學程、永續綠能科技博士學位學程。
學院:限永續與綠能科技研究學院。
en: Department:Master Programs, Sustainability in Green Energy、Ph.D. Programs, Sustainability in Green Energy only.
Faculty:College of Graduate College of Sustainability and Green Energy only.
